1434240.name: Steam Game Festival
1434240.description:
The Steam Game Festival is a multi-day celebration where fans can try out demos, chat with developers, watch live streams, and learn about upcoming games on Steam. For developers, the Steam Game Festival is an opportunity to get early feedback from players and build an audience for a future launch on Steam.

Check out some of the videos from the Steam Game Festival!
1434240.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
